actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill; Vietnam Disengagement Act of 1973.

summary.text: Vietnam Disengagement Act - Prohibits any further funds from being authorized, appropriated, or expended under any law for United States military combat operations in or over North Vietnam, South Vietnam, Laos, and Cambodia. Provides that such operations shall be terminated immediately, subject only to arrangements for: (1) the release of all American prisoners of war; (2) an accounting of all Americans missing in action; and (3) the safe withdrawal of all remaining United States forces.

titles.title: A bill; Vietnam Disengagement Act of 1973.
